results.name: Onboard Turborepo monorepo
results.summary: The output fully satisfies all expectations. The C3 documentation comprehensively captures the Turborepo monorepo structure with well-defined containers for web and api apps, properly documents all three shared packages (ui, api-client, database), clearly shows container dependencies, and acknowledges the Turborepo build system throughout.

results.name: Design greenfield SaaS with C3
results.summary: All expectations are fully met. The output includes a comprehensive ADR-000 architectural blueprint, context documentation describing TaskFlow's purpose, 4 defined containers (frontend, API, database, Redis), extensive WebSocket/real-time documentation, and detailed component documentation for auth, tasks, and teams modules.

results.name: Onboard simple Express app
results.summary: The documentation comprehensively covers all architectural aspects. The README provides clear system context with diagrams, container responsibilities are documented, Auth is properly identified as a foundation component with no dependencies, Users and Products are documented as feature components depending on auth, and cross-cutting patterns are explicitly listed including auth, REST patterns, and error handling.

results.name: Query existing C3 architecture
results.summary: The agent successfully navigated the C3 documentation structure, reading only from the .c3/ directory to answer architecture questions. It properly referenced all required component IDs and correctly identified the foundation vs feature component categorization from the existing documentation.

results.name: Audit C3 docs for stale references
results.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized the v2 consolidation into index.ts. However, it failed to provide explicit actionable recommendations for updating the documentation, instead only displaying the current document states.

results.name: Add new feature via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: The agent successfully followed the C3 alter workflow by creating an ADR first (adr-20260113-notification-routes.md), then creating the component documentation (c3-106-notification-routes.md), updating the container README with the new component, and properly documenting dependencies on c3-102 and c3-105.
